frontend.auth.loginExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
frontend.login.title: Log in
frontend.adminEvents.title: Manage events
frontend.adminEvents.noEvents.past: No past events to show. Would you like to <1>view upcoming events</1> or <3>create a new event</3>?
frontend.adminEvents.noEvents.upcoming: No upcoming events to show. Would you like to <1>view past events</1> or <3>create a new event</3>?
frontend.adminEvents.column.name: Name
frontend.adminEvents.action.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This cannot be undone.
frontend.adminUsers.title: User management
frontend.adminUsers.deleteUser.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{user}}? This cannot be undone.
frontend.adminUsers.deleteUser.errors.CannotDelet: You can't delete your own user.
frontend.adminUsers.deleteUser.errors.404.descrip: The user {{user}} has already been deleted.
frontend.adminUsers.resetPassword.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the password for {{user}}? The new password will be sent to their email address.
frontend.adminUsers.resetPassword.success: The password for {{user}} was successfully reset.
frontend.adminUsers.createUser.passwordInfo: The new user will receive their password via email.
frontend.adminUsers.createUser.errors.409.descrip: A user already exists with the email {{email}}.
frontend.adminUsers.changePassword.errors.minLeng: The password must have at least {{number}} characters
frontend.initialSetup.title: Create admin user
frontend.initialSetup.welcome2: Start by creating the first admin user. You can create more admin users later via the admin panel.
frontend.initialSetup.errors.minLength: The password must have at least {{number}} characters
frontend.initialSetup.errors.InitialSetupAlreadyD: The initial user has already been created. Please log in with an existing user.
frontend.auditLog.title: Audit log
frontend.auditLog.description.promoteSignup: signup {{signup}} was accepted from queue in event <3>{{event}}</3>
frontend.editor.loadError.404.title: Event not found
frontend.editor.loadError.404.description: An event with id {{eventId}} was not found. It may be deleted.
frontend.editor.saveInvalid: The event has errors. Correct them and try saving again.
frontend.editor.errors.tooSmall: The value must be at least {{minimum}}
frontend.editor.errors.tooLarge: The value must be at most {{maximum}}
frontend.editor.errors.invalidSlug: Only the characters A-Z, a-z, 0-9, - and _ are allowed
frontend.editor.errors.dateInverted: The event cannot end before it starts
frontend.editor.errors.registrationDateInverted: The signup cannot close before it opens
frontend.editor.errors.optionsTooLong: The combined answer options are too long
frontend.editor.basic.languages.info: The default language is used if the user's language preference is unknown or there is no explicit language version.
frontend.editor.basic.name: Event name
frontend.editor.basic.endDate.info: The event will only appear in calendar exports if it has an ending time.
frontend.editor.basic.url.reserved: This URL is already in use for {{event}}
frontend.editor.basic.listed.info: Hidden events are only accessible via URL. Events saved as draft cannot be viewed by users regardless of this setting.
frontend.editor.basic.description.info: Markdown can be used in the description.
frontend.editor.basic.signupsPublic.check: Signups to this event are public
frontend.editor.basic.signupsPublic.info: The attendee can decide whether their name is publicly visible. Answers to public custom questions are always visible.
frontend.editor.quotas.quotaName.singleQuota: If there is only one quota, you can e.g. give it the same name as the event.
frontend.editor.quotas.quotaName.reorder: You can reorder quotas by dragging from the handles on the left.
frontend.editor.quotas.quotaSize.info: If the quota size is unlimited, leave the field empty.
frontend.editor.quotas.openQuota.info: Signups that did not fit in their own quota will be automatically placed in the open quota, in the order of signups.
frontend.editor.questions.nameQuestion.infoOn: Name will be a required question. Each participant can decide if their name is publicly visible.
frontend.editor.questions.nameQuestion.infoOff: If names are collected, each participant can decide if their name is publicly visible.
frontend.editor.questions.emailQuestion.infoOn: Email will be a mandatory question. Participants will be sent a confirmation email and an email notification if they got accepted from the queue.
frontend.editor.questions.emailQuestion.infoOff: If email addresses are not collected, participants will not get a confirmation email nor an email notification if they got accepted from the queue.
frontend.editor.preview.languageInfo: Use the language button in the top navigation to preview the event in different languages.
frontend.editor.signups.noSignups: There are currently no signups for this event. When people sign up, they will appear here.
frontend.editor.signups.emptyQuota: There are currently no signups for this quota. When people sign up, they will appear here.
frontend.editor.signups.action.delete.confirm: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
frontend.editor.editConflict.title: Conflicting edits
frontend.editor.editConflict.info1: Another user or tab has edited this event at <1>{{time}}</1>.
frontend.editor.editConflict.info1.withDeleted: Another user or tab has edited this event at <1>{{time}}</1> and deleted the following quotas or questions:
frontend.editor.editConflict.question: Question:
frontend.editor.editConflict.info2: You can save the event and overwrite the other user's changes, or abandon the changes you've made and continue from the event edited by the other user.
frontend.editor.moveToQueue.title: Move signups to queue?
frontend.editor.moveToQueue.info1: The changes you're making to quotas would move at least {{number}} people, already accepted into the event, into the queue. These users will not be notified automatically.
frontend.editor.moveToQueue.info2: Are you sure you want to proceed?
frontend.editor.checkMemberships.label: Check memberships
frontend.editor.checkMemberships.placeholder: Enter email addresses separated by line breaks
frontend.editor.editSignup.sendEmail.edit: Send the participant a confirmation email
frontend.editor.editSignup.sendEmail.create: Send the participant a confirmation email
frontend.editor.editSignup.validation: This form bypasses answer validation. Check your entered values carefully.
frontend.editor.editSignup.error.NoSuchSignup.des: The signup was not found. It might be already deleted..
